reviewText: I really like Mike's approach.  It's both musical and technical.  I've only been working a few weeks and progress has been great.

These are fundamentals that can easily be missed by eager players. Incorporate these basics and watch how much easier and confident your playing will become.
Why spend laborious time retraining and back pedaling from bad habits. Learn good habits and learn from someone who is a kind master.
Mike Marshall is a great teacher and this disc will help anyone to become a better mandolin player.
I am an intermediate/advanced player and was stuck on that plateau, this DVD was great and in the first 5 minutes I was moving up the mountain again! Great strides made Thanks mike!
This is over my skill level but I'm working toward it. He is very positive and takes it step by step.
mike's cd on chords is awesome for intermediate mandolin pickers... it has really inspired me to practice chords and use better chord voicing. nice for people who are starting on with jazz....
